summary: The Las Vegas Strip is a famous 4.2-mile-long part of Las Vegas Boulevard in Nevada. It's located just outside the city of Las Vegas and is known for its many hotels, casinos, and resorts. You'll find huge and beautiful buildings, bright lights, and lots of fun things to do. It's a top tourist spot, attracting visitors from all over the world, and it's a big reason why Las Vegas is such a popular place to visit.
title: Las Vegas Strip
